title: El Camino: Netflix's new trailer for Breaking Bad movie shows Jesse on the run – video
text: Netflix surprised Breaking Bad fans last month with news of a TV 'event' helmed by series director Vince Gilligan: a film which promises to pick up 'moments after' the critically acclaimed TV show ended in 2013, with Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul) making a dramatic escape and driving to El Camino. Paul reprises his role in the film, where he'll be joined by series cast members Matt Jones (Badger) and Charles Baker (Skinny Pete), with more details to be announced. El Camino launches on Netflix on 11 October
description: Sequel to TV series shows a troubled Jesse Pinkman making a dramatic escape and driving to El Camino
